channel.title: [PI] Conditional object teleports
channel.description: mk so basicly i want a teleport to check if a player is in a certain area, and if so then teleport then somewhere else. I'm pretty much remaking the hybrid pvp fight cave in a 317, and I dont feel like leeching it so can some1 just say what i would do in my actionhandler class to check if a player is in the cave. dont say anything like c.ifInFloor1, cuz that wil only check if your character is in the area, not if some1 else's character is.

item.title: [PI] Conditional object teleports
item.dc:creator: @rrooaarr rrooaarr
item.description:
@rrooaarr wrote:

im pretty sure u dont get it… ur checking if your character is in the area, not someone elses…
im prolly just ganna leech it off of hpvp

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Conditional object teleports
item.dc:creator: @Repu Repu
item.description:
@Repu wrote:

I’d do something like the following if I wanted to know if they were between X 10, Y 10 and X 20, Y 20 and then act as necessary.

if ((c.absX > 10 && c.absY > 10) && (c.absX < 20 && c.absY < 20)) { c.triggerTele(1, 1); } else { c.triggerTele(2, 2); }

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Conditional object teleports
item.dc:creator: @rrooaarr rrooaarr
item.description:
@rrooaarr wrote:

…rly? im almost fairly positive this will do exactly what i said i didnt need. correct me if im wrong but this will check if you yourself are in an area when you activate the case. not check if someone else is in the area. what i want it to do is teleport a person to jad on the next floor (the map is redrawn every 4 height levels) if someone is already in the previous floor. so i need a statement that checks if someone else is in an area.
thanks for helping though

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Conditional object teleports
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

case ####: if(inAreaOne) { codeForTeleporting; } else { codeForTeleporting; break;

Something like that, but use conventions.

Read full topic
